inclusion.criterion: Patients enrolled prior to surgery: Diagnosis of clinical T1-2N0 ER+ invasive breast cancer as determined by treating physician. DCIS or LCIS may be present with invasive cancer.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients enrolled after surgery: pT1-2NX, or pT1-2N0, ER+ invasive breast cancer. DCIS or LCIS may be present with invasive cancer.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Plan to undergo lumpectomy within 3 months of study registration, or underwent lumpectomy within 60 days of study registration (without sentinel node biopsy)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with diagnosis of ductal or lobular carcinoma in situ
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with diagnosis of inflammatory breast cancer
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have undergone neoadjuvant chemotherapy for current primary breast cancer (past treatments for other cancers are acceptable)
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has Turner syndrome, short stature, delayed puberty and developmental delay. She is obese and mentally retarded.
